alert.note: Alert for Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 7:11PM EDT until June 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOORE...SCOTLAND...ANSON...RICHMOND AND SOUTHWESTERN HOKE COUNTIES... At 710 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Raeford to near Hamlet to near Chesterfield, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 709 pm, emergency management reported power lines down in Rockingham. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Laurinburg, Rockingham, Wadesboro, Hamlet, Maxton, Hoffman, Pinebluff, Ellerbe, Foxfire and Dobbins Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
